Package com.atakmap.android.util

Class IconUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.util.IconUtilities
  • public class IconUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    A convenience set of methods to help convert things to and from encoded images and bitmaps for use for markers and menus.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor Description
      IconUtilities()

    • Method Detail

      • setIcon

        public static void setIcon​(android.content.Context context,
                           Marker marker,
                           @DrawableRes
                           int res,
                           boolean adapt)
        Given a drawable resource, create a bitmap and then encode the bitmap as an icon.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use
        marker - The marker to set the icon
        res - The drawable resource to be used.
        adapt - True if the icon can be adapted when the type is changed. This means that the icon will be replaced with an appropriate icon for the new type. False if the icon is considered permanently set and can only be changed by manually calling this method again.

      • getBitmap

        @Nullable
public static android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmap​(android.content.Context context,
                                                @DrawableRes
                                                int drawableId)
        Given a drawable resource turn it into a bitmap
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use for looking up the drawable
        drawableId - The resource ID for the drawable
        Returns:
        Bitmap representation of the drawable or null if failed

      • getBitmap

        @NonNull
public static android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmap​(@NonNull
                                                android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable,
                                                int width,
                                                int height)
        Given a drawable resource turn it into a bitmap
        Parameters:
        drawable - Drawable icon
        width - Desired bitmap width
        height - Desired bitmap height
        Returns:
        Bitmap version of drawable

      • getBitmap

public static android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmap​(@NonNull

        Given a drawable resource turn it into a bitmap
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Bitmap version of drawable

      • encodeBitmap

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String encodeBitmap​(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        Given a bitmap, return an encoded base64:// asset that can be used in areas where an icon. During this process it uses in memory compression and conversion of the bitmap to png, so be mindful of the size of the input bitmap.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - the bitmap to encode as base64://
        Returns:
        Base64 string encoded that can be decoded.

      • decodeBitmap

        @Nullable
public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeBitmap​(java.lang.String encoded)
        Given a base64:// encoded image, decode into a bitmap
        Parameters:
        encoded - The encoded image to get the bitmap from. Must start with base64://
        Returns:
        New Bitmap from the encoded image.
